snippets.title: LinkedIn Connection Request
snippets.message: Hi [NAME], I noticed your impressive work as a [ROLE] at [COMPANY]. I'd love to connect and learn more about your experience in the field!

snippets.title: Cold Email - Job Inquiry
snippets.message:
Dear [NAME],

I hope this email finds you well. I came across [COMPANY] and was incredibly impressed by your team's work in the industry.

I'm reaching out because I'm passionate about [ROLE] positions and would love to explore opportunities to contribute to your team.

Would you be open to a brief conversation?

Best regards

snippets.title: Follow-up Message
snippets.message:
Hi [NAME],

I wanted to follow up on my previous message about potential opportunities at [COMPANY] for the [ROLE] position.

I'd love to discuss how my skills and experience could add value to your team.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

info: This is a local JSON storage file for Snippet Sparkle. The app uses localStorage by default, but you can import/export snippets using this format.
